name: Blast Miner (itch)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48, theme: Deeper and Deeper.

Match up pairs of bombs to blow up ground!

Use A and D to move the bomb dropper, and SPACE to drop!

You move down with every chain of explosions, so line up longer chains to blow up more ground at once! 

See how deep you can go!

Bombs do not blow up other kinds of bombs, and bombs will fall first before exploding.

There is no audio, compo is a time crunch.

Check out updates on my other projects at @Topper_Games

Have fun!
